title: New: Fitness Club Fiasco – Goldmine
content:
I’m not quite sure why it’s taken me so long to realise that Bastille are just a watered down version of The Killers, without any of the bravado or Springsteen pompousness.

Ontario quintet Fitness Club Fiasco undoubtedly owe a fair amount to the moustachioed mormon and co, with their sugary sweet, too epic for words single Goldmine. ‘You’ve got me standing on a goldmine, when I’m looking into your eyes’ serenades lead singer and chief songwriter Mike Harloff, on a chorus that is one of the most guiltily enjoyable of the year.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
